# Domain Sparring Plugins

This directory contains standalone, pre-packaged plugins for specific domains, generated by `scripts/generate_plugins.py`.

## Available Plugins

| Plugin                  | Domain      | Description                                                 |
| :---------------------- | :---------- | :---------------------------------------------------------- |
| `marketing-sparring/`   | Marketing   | Content creation, demand gen, and strategy sparring.        |
| `engineering-sparring/` | Engineering | Code reviews, architecture, and devops sparring.            |
| `c-level-sparring/`     | C-Suite     | Executive strategy, board management, and decision support. |
| `product-sparring/`     | Product     | RICE prioritization, roadmapping, and user stories.         |
| `solopreneur-sparring/` | Solopreneur | Full-stack business management for one-person shops.        |

## How to Install

You can install any of these plugins directly into Claude Code.

### Option A: Install from this folder

1.  Navigate to the specific plugin folder:
    ```bash
    cd dist/plugins/marketing-sparring
    ```
2.  Use it as your local plugin context.

### Option B: Distribute

You can zip any of these folders and share them. They are fully self-contained with their own `lib/` and `skills/`.

## Regeneration

To update these plugins with the latest skills and code:

```bash
python scripts/generate_plugins.py --clean
```
